channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Glass in road, 9th July
item.description:
A significant amount of glass is in the road, on the junction between Leckhampton Hill and the A436 at the Air Balloon roundabout. It wasn't there at 5am this morning (Sunday 9th july) but has appeared during the day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown, 9th July
item.description:
Path blocked

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bird Road, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Footpath / public right of way obstructed by brambles / overgrowth, 9th July
item.description:
The footpath / public right of way is obstructed by brambles / overgrowth meaning it’s difficult to cross the bridge and walk the route.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashchurch Rural, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement Parking Outside Co-op, 9th July
item.description:
Vehicles are regularly parking on the pavement, on the keep clear areas in peak times blocking the pavement. This is usually when children are walking to school making it incredibly dangerous. People with disabilities or prams could not pass due to the amount of pavement parking

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 143, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Single yellow line worn away, 9th July
item.description:
The single yellow line cannot be seen any longer meaning vehicles are regularly blocking the road by parking here when using the Co-op.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole and Shurdington Nurseries hedge, 8th July
item.description:
Very deep potholes along Dark Lane. Also vehicles to avoid Shurdington Nurseries hedge which they never cut are driving off the opposite side of the lanes tarmac creating a deep rut, which it is becoming difficult to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dark Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Bins 2 lots, 8th July
item.description:
Bins left out on pavements along the wall of number 15 St Pauls walk, constant problem of not placing bins away as described in council rules on refuse collection
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, St Paul's Walk, St Paul’s, Cheltenham

item.title: Rubbish Bins and Recycling, 8th July
item.description:
Rubbish bins and recycling bins left on pavement and not being placed within boundary of property as summerised on council webpages, that all bins must be removed within 24hrs of collection day. This is an ongoing issue with bins spilling out onto local area. Bins also smell of rotting food.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Manser Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Ragwort, 6th July
item.description:

item.title: Long grass restricting view of road, 6th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tommy Taylors Lane, St Paul’s, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole as you drive in to Finstock close, 5th July
item.description:
Pothole roughly opposite number 3. Reported earlier in the year, had an email to say it was fixed. It never was. Forwarded that email to highways, still not fixed and now much bigger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Swanswell Drive, St Mark's, Cheltenham
